posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for? 
Mod on Jail Break/ TTT (either works)

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone):
USA, Eastern Time

[NNJG] Jake Venture

REDACTED@REDACTED
7) How long have you been involved (frequent player, moderator, donator, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ server: December 2010

8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)?: Moderation in TTT and/or Jail, I'm a current student learning web design.

9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?: I think I would make a fine addition to your team.

10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience: almost a 100 hrs worth on gmod... (I spend a lot of time on Gmod), TF2 3.1 hrs and CSS: almost a days worth (on this account my original account before it got hacked was mostly made for CSS)

11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server?: I had one up in gmod but closed it due to the bugs

12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it?: yes, I use it a lot..... almost all the time

13) Any other Comments or information you can provide:

I have nothing else :) but thank you for looking this over...
Oh! I have a minecraft server up and running :3

You could have editted that at least.

Well, my opinion (not like it matters i think). I do not support this person by the name of Jake Venture since he is not a regular player of TTT. I believe other players that are regulars would be more suitable for the position of a moderator on TTT.

I believe there will be little to none support for him becoming a moderator on TTT.
I have never once seen this person on TTT, and the 10 reccomendations are NOT optional.

We must be missing each other because I have been playing :)

_____________________________________________________________________

and can you give me the details on recommendations? Just be like "yo dawg, would you recommend me to be a mod on NNJG's (insert server here)?"

Another reason why you may not remember me is because I changed my steam name from deathwing to Jake Venture... So I thought I should create another account using my current name.

I have either never or barely ever seen you on TTT, and you just recently joined our forum 3 days ago. Plus, as Kobooold said, you do need the recommendations.

Denied for now, you can apply again in a few weeks if we need more moderators and if you become more active.
